name: @nekofar/virgool
description: Virgool lets you publish posts automatically to a Virgool profile.
author: Milad Nekofar <milad@nekofar.com>

scripts.update-po: yarn make-pot && find languages -name '*.po' -exec msgmerge -vUN {} languages/virgool.pot \;
scripts.dist-prepare: yarn update && yarn phpcs && yarn phpcbf && yarn readme && yarn update-mo
